[center][size=3][b]This is a Retex for college of winterhold -> (there are 3 different versions)
choose one between: [color=#6aa84f]Restyling-A[/color][color=gray] [/color][color=#f4f4f4]or[/color][color=gray] [/color][color=#6aa84f]Restyling-B[/color][color=gray] [/color][color=#f4f4f4]or[/color][color=gray] [/color][color=#6aa84f]Restyling-C[/color]Â and Install..[/b][/size][/center]




[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/wIQv1FU.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=3][b]Extract the contents of the zipped file into your Skyrim/folder
usually [color=#9fc5e8](steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)[/color][/b][/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/8HGcNmZ.png[/img][/center]
